articles.description: How much the next stimulus checks are worth, when taxpayers can expect to receive them and other key details about the American Rescue Plan payments.
articles.content:
How much are the payments worth?
The third economic impact payment is worth up to $1,400 per individual and dependent.
Single filers earning an adjusted gross income (AGI) up to $75,000 and heads o… [+2860 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Harlan, CNN
articles.title: These epic Girl Scout cookie-inspired recipes put a new spin on classic flavors - CNN
articles.description: The chefs at Denver's Crafted Concepts offer recipes for Samoas Coconut Panna Cotta and Thin Mint Mousse Tart as alternatives to simply scarfing down your box of treats.
articles.content: (CNN)Freezing Thin Mints before devouring them, one by one, is as fancy as some of us get during Girl Scout cookie season. But this year, twopastry chefs from Denver put their culinary creativity to … [+7492 chars]
